1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

Personal Information: We may collect personal information, such as your name, email address, shipping address, and payment information when you make a purchase.

Device Information: We may collect information about the device you use to access our app, including the device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.

Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use our app, including the pages you visit, the products you view, and the actions you take.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information for the following purposes:

To process and fulfill your orders. 
To communicate with you about your orders, promotions, and updates. 
To improve and personalize your experience with our app. \To analyze and understand how users interact with our app. 
3. Information Sharing

We may share your information with:

Service providers who help us with order processing, shipping, and other business functions. 
Legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights. 
4. Your Choices

You can:
\Update your account information. \Opt-out of promotional emails. 
5. Security
We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

6. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Please review it periodically for changes.

7. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at rubabahajiyeva@gmail.com.
